comments.text:
Hello,

I was looking for some information on this source. Is it an import?
Is the stream direction for https://www.openstreetmap.org/way/527730240 right? As it goes along it gets smaller and smaller, I'd have thought it was flowing to the southwest.
Living streets here surprises me since they're normally used where there are traffic problems - are you sure they're not residential roads or service roads?

Hello,

You've made https://www.openstreetmap.org/way/527727984 which overlaps with a footpath. Does the footpath need moving, or is the building wrong?
